Text:
Hey bro, I accidentally uploaded the extracted version of this here: http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6009170/Lynda.com_Photoshop_Elements_9_Essential_Training_by_team_JGTiSO

You really should include Lynda in your torrent descriptions cause there are a lot of people that are specifically looking for Lynda training videos and don't realize that your uploads are exactly that. 

Myself included - which is why I uploaded the torrent above not realizing it was already on TPB.
